column3: “This should be the poster boy or calendar girl for sativas. This strain was absolutely uplifting and made my morning glorious! I would advice vaping it, tasted better and affected me for much longer compared to the first time I smoked it via pipe. This strain will make you super productive. If you're thinking about cleaning the house all day with great energy and enthusiasm, light this motherfucker up!”

“If you are over the age of 50, you can relate to this strain better i believe. Back in the mid 1970's, high powered thc bearing sensimilla strains were not commonly available in the US. One of the strains that changed this was Hawaiian. Morning Glory reminds me alot of Hawaiian from this era. I think this sample i got  must have tested 17 % THC,- hardly chronic! but the taste and effect are very simillar to what we u...”

“This strain’s aroma is fresh green lime, spicy pepper with earthy notes. Morning Glory’s stimulating physical effects, conversent and soaring mental state make it a perfect cut to enjoy amongst friends.”

“The second strain I ever tried. still one of my favorites. I find this strain to differ in effects between situations. Among friends, this strain provides a chill high, comfortfable leaning back, great for having a relaxed conversation while playing games with friend and having a laugh. After a while the indica becomes more pronounced and you get slower, sleepier, and even more couch potato. When alone, the indica is...”
“The taste of Morning Glory first thing in the morning is Absolutely Amazing!!! Like fresh flowers and fresh fruit plus a hint of lavender. ❤️❤️❤️❤️❤️ Reminds me of the candy, sweet tarts.”
“this is probably close to the best sativa I've ever smoked. I feel like a better person after I smoke this strain.”

“I personally love this strain. It's definitely one to get you up and moving. VERY good for stress relief. It's one of my go-to strains for unwinding after a long day at work, when I'm not quite ready to go to bed yet. It can be difficult to locate. Not in every shop, but not super rare either.”

“Another great strain, made me feel very relaxed and calm. Had a nice citrus, pepper taste to it. It is a total stress destroyer. The high for me was a bit heady, but still manageable and later it worked into a nice mellow relaxing body high. Made me want to take a nap and I slept blissfully. I like it.”

“Wow...so i had a couple pre-rolls from Virginia Co and noticed it was 17% THC so i thought ok whatever expecting an average high and smoked half of what was 3/4 gram preroll and was ripped...from head to toe like I used to get back in the day. great  trippy high - fantastic strain...don't be fooled by the low"THC percentage..”"
